message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $1200000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you is $1000000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I've placed on the product.

I understand that $1100000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $1150000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my minimum sale price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1125000, but that's as high as I can go.

I appreciate your honesty about your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. My final counteroffer is $1175000. I think this is the best price we can both agree on, considering the product's value to you and my minimum sale price.
